title: The Reckless Abandon of God’s Love
itunes:title: The Reckless Abandon of God’s Love
description: God does not love as we do, in a calculating manner. He makes his sun to shine on the good and the bad alike and his rain to fall on the just and the unjust alike. This means that he is like the Good Shepherd who seeks even the one sheep who is lost and like the father who welcomes back even the prodigal.
